trans-unit.target: Esta classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] A tracking service that implements the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification> interface raises a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileRemoved> event to notify the runtime tracking infrastructure that new instances of a particular workflow <xref:System.Type> should no longer be tracked.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Um serviço de controlo que implementa o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification>interface gera um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileRemoved>eventos notificar o tempo de execução controlo infraestrutura que novas instâncias de um fluxo de trabalho específico <xref:System.Type>já não deve ser controlada.</xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileRemoved> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification>

trans-unit.source: The tracking service uses a ProfileRemovedEventArgs to provide the workflow <xref:System.Type> to the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: O serviço de controlo utiliza um ProfileRemovedEventArgs para fornecer o fluxo de trabalho <xref:System.Type>para o infraestrutura de controlo de tempo de execução.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> uses a ProfileRemovedEventArgs when it raises the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService.ProfileRemoved?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>utiliza um ProfileRemovedEventArgs quando gera o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService.ProfileRemoved?displayProperty=fullName>eventos.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService.ProfileRemoved?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>

trans-unit.source: After a tracking service raises the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileRemoved> event, the runtime tracking infrastructure will no longer associate a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> with the specified workflow <xref:System.Type> for that tracking service.
trans-unit.target: Depois de um serviço de controlo gera o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileRemoved>a infraestrutura de controlo do tempo de execução de eventos, já não irá associar um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>com o fluxo de trabalho especificado <xref:System.Type>para que o serviço de controlo.</xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileRemoved>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: If you use this constructor when you raise a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileRemoved> event inside a tracking service, you must explicitly set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se utilizar este construtor quando gere um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileRemoved>evento dentro de um serviço de controlo, tem de definir explicitamente <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileRemoved>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs"></xref> class that applies to the specified workflow <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs"> </xref> classe que se aplica ao fluxo de trabalho especificado <xref:System.Type>.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs> is created with <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A> set to the specified <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: Uma nova instância do <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs>é criada com <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A>definido como o <xref:System.Type>.</xref:System.Type> especificado</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The workflow <xref:System.Type> for which the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref> should be removed.
trans-unit.target: O fluxo de trabalho <xref:System.Type>para o qual o <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"> </xref> deve ser removida.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the workflow <xref:System.Type> for which the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref> should be removed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o fluxo de trabalho <xref:System.Type>para o qual o <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"> </xref> deve ser removida.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: WorkflowType specifies the workflow <xref:System.Type> for which a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> no longer exists, and which, therefore, should no longer be tracked by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: WorkflowType Especifica o fluxo de trabalho <xref:System.Type>para o qual um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>deixou de existir, e que, por conseguinte, deve já não ser controlada pelo tempo de execução do controlo de infraestrutura.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> </xref:System.Type>
